actions.name: Thief
actions.description: Effect: On hit, the user steals a random item in the target's [Accessory], [Belt], or [Held] slots and equips it to itself in a [Held] slot. If the user already has a [Held] slot occupied, the stolen item is dropped on the ground in a square adjacent to the user.

actions.name: Thief (Pickpocket)
actions.description: Effect: On hit, the user steals a random item in the target's [Accessory], [Belt], or [Held] slots and equips it to itself in a [Held] slot. If the user already has a [Held] slot occupied, the stolen item may either be added to the user's Inventory, or the user freely uses Fling to Bewstow the item to an allied creature.

system.description: Effect: Connection - Thief.
